divs: Sighting Details We where At the Mustang City Park, In Mustang, OK. with family and friends to watch, the fireworks. There where fireworks exploding in a 360 degree's around us. My sister-in-law said Jeff look a UFO,I looked where she pointed. It was above a building in front of us. I pulled out my Samsung Digital Camera. I took two,maybe three pictures. My sister-in-law recorded on her phone. I at first thought was a firework, It was moving very fast,a firework went off near it. It looked like, it jumped,away from the explosion. You can see it jump between the first and second picture. I was excited. It was my first good sighting, It just faded way from us,and was gone. can you let us know if anyone else reported it.
Summary: We went to the park to see, and light off Fireworks.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Mustang
There were no other sightings in Mustang on or around July 4th 2013
